channel.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
channel.description:
Why did you quit with RuneScape, and started with Private Servers?
Like; I was hacked, RuneScape was getting boring, It's more fun, etc.

item.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Was looking for bots and found a toplist and looked at first entry and it looked nice, didnt know it was private server and played it(At the time I didn’t even know what private server was), then I started playing more and more, then i wanted to make my own and then I joined mitb, since mopar didnt exist at the time, and started doing some simple shit, and slowly I started learning java more and more and now i’m here.

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?

item.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Hot_Potato1 Hot_Potato
item.description:
@Hot_Potato1 wrote:

Can’t remember how I quit RuneScape. But my first private server which I played was much easier and more fun. I then, with many problems, created an RSPS. I quit RSPS because of the virus I received from a source. Now tempted to join again…

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?

item.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:52, topic:278525”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=367651.msg3971709#msg3971709 date=1334215343]
I’ve never played RuneScape.
[/quote]

Lol, that’s a bit wierd.[/quote]
Meh I joined the RuneScape cheating scene because my friends started playing RuneScape when I’d already been involved in a cheating community for an online game called Tibia, which had the same principle… emulating for the client. I looked into the RuneScape cheating scene, found Kaitnieks, became a member and started learning Java. Wasn’t until a little after that I started applying it to RuneScape emulators.

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?

item.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I started playing RuneScape in 2002. My friend introduced my to it in 4th grade. Eventually I got kind of greedy, and started looking for RuneScape stat editors, inventory editors, etc. Looking back on it now, I see that it was a folly pursuit (if one existed, Jagex wouldn’t have lasted very long). Anyways, I stumbled upon Kaitnieks and Sythe, and saw pictures of a full bank and maxed skills (I thought it was a program that worked, but it was a picture of a private server). That eventually brought me here, and (after a hell of a struggle) to the world of programming and RSPS.

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?

item.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I started playing in 2004 until the HD update or so. I wasn’t a fan of where the game was heading with summoning, new artstyle, etc. I still bought membership every once in a while after that, but never really played properly again. Judging by how the game looks now, I’m glad I got out when I did.

I have no clue when I started working on private servers. Somewhere around 2008-2009.

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?

item.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

When I started private servers, I didn’t quit RuneScape. I just got into them because I saw someone walking over the map (turns out he was just ::noclipping on the second height level on high detail) and I tried to get into them. I found this place and played tons of servers because of how easy it was to level up (This was back in the days where you punched doors for strength exp).

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?

item.description:

item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?

item.title: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Friend called me up and said to try out a server called frugooscape, that it was a hacked version of runescape. Where you could have anything. I played this for about 2 weeks and then Jagex shut Al down (owner of it all). I moved onto another RSPS called kidscape, owner called himself kidmonkey. His computer stopped working, but he showed me what source he used. I went and downloaded the source, played around with it and learned basic java via that. Although I quit runescape like 06-07ish after HD updates started comming. I was a broke noob and couldn’t afford a nice computer lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you quit RuneScape & started Private Servers?
